item.title: Ethernet In The First Mile
item.description:
Global telecommunication companies are updating their networks from circuit-based to packet-based systems. With the growth of internet-based networks, Ethernet WAN services have become more accessible and affordable. However, businesses often still rely on older technologies like T1, DS3, or SONET for connecting to these services and cloud networks. While these older technologies are reliable and getting cheaper, using Ethernet for the initial connection, known as the “first mile” or “last mile,” offers several benefits...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ethernet-in-the-first-mile/
